channel.title: How to set a logout delay when you are in combat?
channel.description:
Hi all, How do I make it so when you are in combat, it takes like 15 seconds to log out? it is annoying because people just logout when they are going to die?
I will rep++ person who gets it right ;D
Many Thanks[br][size=1]Posted on: July 29, 2007, 09:27:43 AM[/size][hr]Still no way I havent found

item.title: How to set a logout delay when you are in combat?

item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

erm where do I add that?

item.title: How to set a logout delay when you are in combat?
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

Don’t really need the rep but …

public int LogoutDelay = 0;

public void inCombat() { LogoutDelay = 10; }

if(LogoutDelay > 0) LogoutDelay -= 1;

case 9154: //Log out if(LogoutDelay >= 1) { sendMessage("You can't log out until 10 seconds after the end of combat."); } else if(LogoutDelay <= 0) { logout(); savemoreinfo(); }

Read full topic
item.source: How to set a logout delay when you are in combat?
